Affix.Name: Golden Troupe
Affix.Desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 25%. Additionally, when not on the field, Elemental Skill DMG will be further increased by 25%. This effect will be cleared 2s after taking the field.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Golden Night's Bustle
EQUIP_RING.Desc: An ancient silver urn that was once filled with fine wine as red as rubies. Now, it contains nothing but bitter seawater.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Golden Bird's Shedding
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A gold feather made using silver and gold filigree. A crystal-clear sapphire is mounted atop it.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Golden Troupe's Reward
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: An ancient crown that resembles a stage prop more than it does some suzerain's headgear.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Golden Song's Variation
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A flower constructed out of clam, mother-of-pearl, and gold leaf. It blooms proudly.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Golden Era's Prelude
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: This lovely sundial is inlaid with silver and gold. It seems that time has stopped flowing atop its dial plate.
